```{r naiveBayes}
untrace(stop)

# NOT RUN {
## Categorical data only:
data(HouseVotes84, package = "mlbench")
model <- naiveBayes(Class ~ ., data = HouseVotes84)
pred <- predict(model, HouseVotes84)
table(pred, HouseVotes84$Class)
```
